text: Maria Carmen Riu Pascual (born April 11, 1951 in Barcelona) is a swimmer from Spain. She has a disability and is an S3 type swimmer. She raced at the 1968 Summer Paralympics. She came in second in two swimming races. == References == Category:Spanish swimmers Category:Living people Category:1951 births Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Spain Category:Sportspeople from Barcelona Category:1968 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type S3
